ygData.subject: Re: Pissed off pottery buffs? I seem to be unaffected
ygData.msgSnippet: The patch will come on tuesday, so you better stock up on pie tin sketches.(like i did)  :)
ygData.messageBody:
The patch will come on tuesday, so you better stock up on pie tin sketches.(like i did) :)

heartfrost@... wrote:

> From: heartfrost@...
>
> I am currently playing (3am PDT) on Mon 26th and I am making pottery in High Hold. I am getting the same rates of return as always, with one or two copper difference (first time in this city). But I am still buying:
> sketch 11c
> water 15c
> block of clay 44c (x2=88c)
> High quaality Firing Sheet 44c
> Selling finished pie tin- 630c
> Not the best i have done, but still profitable. And I made 17 of 20 successfully.
>
> Cappenvarra
> Master Potter
> Innoruuk Server
